/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with tall buildings, their facades painted in vibrant hues of red and yellow, adding a splash of color to the urban landscape. Cars and taxis are parked along the side of the road, hinting at the city's active transportation system. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the colorful buildings below. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of being in the midst of the city's hustle and bustle.
